ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06

Class ClaimantEditClaimController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.ClaimantEditClaimController

  • public class ClaimantEditClaimController
extends Object
    This ClaimantEditClaimController is a controller class of Claim. By calling this class, user(claimant) can edit the detail information of a Claim.
    Version:
    03/16/2015
    Author:
    CMPUT301W15T06
    See Also:
    DateFormat, ParseException, SimpleDateFormat, Date, Locale

    • Method Detail

      • editClaim

        public void editClaim(String name,
             String begin,
             String end)
               throws StatusException
        This class will allows claimants edit the detail information of the claim, including name, begin date and end date. It will also checks StatusException() warning to prevent crush.
        Parameters:
        name - a String variable
        begin - a String variable
        end - a String variable
        Throws:
        StatusException
        See Also:
        DateFormat, ParseException, SimpleDateFormat, Date
